summary: Wallace is A Hero Of Old A DragonBorn in Years Long Forgotten His Heroic Deeds Earned Him A place In Sovnagrde But He Grows Restless And Bored. He Has Now Returned To Nirn In a Search Of The Last DragonBorn To Once Have Meaning Again in His LIfe For Battle and Glory!
descriptionHtml:
Wallance Comes From A TIme Long Forgotten and Ruled As a Mighty KIng far North in a place Not know to the world . The Date of his Birth Is unknown Born Of The DragonBlood he alway's seeks a Challenge and battles .HIs skills Were Unmatched And His thu'um Strong. he Destoryed Many Evils in His Homeland and thus so his People named him King. Ruling his People With Great Happiness For Many Years. He Died As Of Old Age And was Welcome In to Shor's Hall were he stayed For Years, But Then Grew Tired And Seeks Bigger Meaning to his life so he returned to nirn to find the dragonborn that has risen to join him in his battles And Quests.[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60448-1-1417521651.jpg[/img]
He is High level Of Course He lived Once Before his Skills do Not Fade Away only increase

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60448-1-1417523224.jpg[/img]
His Thu'um is Strong And Storms Come To Face His Enemies

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60448-3-1417521651.jpg[/img]
Ebony Warrior tries To prove Himself to The Snow King.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60448-2-1417521651.jpg[/img]
All Your Enemies Will Fear Him .He Can Be Found in the drunken huntsmen

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60448-4-1417521651.jpg[/img]
Pretty Cool Dude he Can be Married And Steward if you have the DLC

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60448-5-1417521651.jpg[/img]
Also he has the Ability to Summon Tsun himself To AId Him in Battle




He is Fun Overall And Should Work With Any Mod 
worked on him for awhile now and hope to give him a custom voice soon 
Note he is very powerful do NOT piss him off!!!!!
He is in The Drunken Huntsmen
You need Dragonborn DLC
Give Him A Try
Note. Due To a Bug you also get a Exclusive Teldryn Sero Upgrade follower here is the details about him  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60325/? you don't require this mod


Please show your support if you like this mod.
Thank you.
author: XMarioAscended
